entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
